程序包的使用
us.codecraft.webmagic.utils

  • 使用us.codecraft.webmagic.utils的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    us.codecraft.webmagic
    Main class "Spider" and models.
    us.codecraft.webmagic.pipeline
    Pipeline is the persistent and offline process part of crawler.
    us.codecraft.webmagic.selector
    Selectors for page extraction.
  • us.codecraft.webmagic使用的us.codecraft.webmagic.utils中的类 
    类 说明
    Experimental
    Stands for features unstable.
  • us.codecraft.webmagic.pipeline使用的us.codecraft.webmagic.utils中的类 
    类 说明
    FilePersistentBase
    Base object of file persistence.
  • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector使用的us.codecraft.webmagic.utils中的类 
    类 说明
    Experimental
    Stands for features unstable.
